tool.name: Compare
tool.description: InStrain is a tool for analysis of co-occurring genome populations from metagenomes, Compare: compares multiple inStrain profiles (popANI, coverage_overlap, etc.)
tool.command: #if $stb cp '$stb' 'stb_file.stb' && #end if #if $other.genome cp '$other.genome' 'genome_file.stb' && #end if #for $i, $s in enumerate($input) mkdir -p $i-input.IS && mkdir -p $i-inputGalaxy.IS && unzip '${s.input_is}' -d '$i-input.IS/' && mv $i-input.IS/*.IS/* $i-inputGalaxy.IS && #end for inStrain compare #if $input --input '0-inputGalaxy.IS' '1-inputGalaxy.IS' #end if --output 'output.IS.COMPARE' --processes "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-6}" #if $stb --stb 'stb_file.stb' #end if --min_cov $variant_calling.min_cov --min_freq $variant_calling.min_freq --fdr $variant_calling.fdr $database.database_mode --breadth $database.breadth #if $other.scaffolds --scaffolds '$other.scaffolds' #end if #if $other.genome --genome 'genome_file.stb' #end if $other.store_coverage_overlap $other.store_mismatch_locations $other.include_self_comparisons $other.skip_plot_generation --group_length $other.group_length --ani_threshold $genome_clustering.ani_threshold --coverage_treshold $genome_clustering.coverage_treshold --clusterAlg '$genome_clustering.clusterAlg'

param.name: input_is
param.label: inStrain Profile IS folder
param.help: Upload a Zip or Tar file for the IS profile output folder

param.label: Scaffold to bin
param.help: This can be a file with each line listing a scaffold and a bin name, tab-seperated. This can also be a space-seperated list of .fasta files, with one genome per .fasta file. If nothing is provided, all scaffolds will be treated as belonging to the same genome

param.label: Minimum coverage to call an variant
Minimum SNP frequency to confirm a SNV
param.help: Both this AND the FDR snp count cutoff must be true to call a SNP.
SNP false discovery rate- based on simulation data with a 0.1 percent error rate (Q30)

param.label: Automatically determine which genomes are present in each Profile and only compare scaffolds from those genomes.
param.help: All profiles must have run Profile with the same .stb

param.label: Minimum breadth_minCov required to count a genome present
Location to a list of scaffolds to compare. You can also make this a .fasta file and it will load the scaffold names
Run scaffolds belonging to this single genome only. Must provide an .stb file
Store coverage overlap on an mm level
Dont create plots at the end of the run
How many bp to compare simultaneously
param.help: higher will use more RAM and run more quickly

param.label: popANI threshold to cluster genomes at
param.help: Must provide .stb file to do so

param.label: Minimum percent_genome_compared for a genome comparison to count
param.help: if below the popANI will be set to 0

data.name: comparisonsTable
data.label: Summarizes the differences between two inStrain profiles on a scaffold by scaffold level

data.name: pairwise_SNP_locations
data.label: Lists the locations of all differences between profiles.

data.name: genomeWide_compare
data.label: A genome-level summary of the differences detected by inStrain compare.
